name: Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology
name_original: Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology
description:
Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology is an action game. It was originally released in 2011. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Tales of the World: Radiant Mythology is available on PSP.
Go Shiina, Motoi Sakuraba and Takuya Yasuda scored the game.
